name: Taco Truck
description: Serving authentic Mexican street tacos with fresh ingredients and bold flavors.

name: Burger Bus
description: A retro-styled food truck offering juicy burgers, crispy fries, and milkshakes.

name: Gourmet Grills
description: Premium grilled dishes and BBQ platters crafted by expert chefs.

name: Pizza Wagon
description: A wood-fired pizza truck serving hand-tossed pies with gourmet toppings.

name: Dessert Truck
description: Decadent desserts, from gourmet cupcakes to indulgent ice cream sundaes.

name: BBQ Express
description: Smoked meats, tangy sauces, and classic BBQ sides served hot and fast.

name: Seafood Shack
description: Fresh seafood delights, from shrimp tacos to grilled fish, sourced locally.

name: Hot Dog Haven
description: Classic hot dogs, gourmet sausages, and creative toppings for every taste.

name: Coffee Cruiser
description: Mobile coffee bar offering artisanal espresso and cold brew.

name: Breakfast Truck
description: All-day breakfast favorites served fresh and hot.
